Texts.Chs: 使用榴弹/火箭发射器和机枪时，其基础攻击力增加至110%。
Texts.Eng: 110% Base Power with Grenade/Rocket Launchers and Machine Pistols.

Texts.Chs: 使用你的扳手时，其基础攻击力增加至120%。
可以双持榴弹发射器（和机械降神）。
Texts.Eng: Can Dual-Wield Grenade Launchers (and Ex Mechina).

Texts.Chs: 可以使用一切近战武器。
机械降神...还有一把扳手？
机械降神：单手火箭发射器。发射一枚在敌人附近爆炸的火箭。爆炸时，会留下一小部分电弧能量，伤害附近的敌人。
Texts.Eng: Ex Mechina: a One-Handed Rocket Launcher. Fires a rocket that explodes near enemies. Upon exploding, a small sphere of arc energy is left behind that hurts nearby enemies.

Texts.Chs:
附近的友好机器人获得生命恢复和+30防御。
在友好机器人附近获得+3-防御和+50%最大能量。
Texts.Eng:
Nearby Friendly Robots gain Health Regen and +30 Protection.
Gain +30 Protection and +50% Max Energy while near Friendly Robots.

Texts.Chs: 按[Special 1]制造飞行无人机，或者蹲下建造自动炮塔：每种都有独立的60秒冷却时间。炮塔和无人机持续60秒或直到被击败。炮塔和无人机的与您自己的HP和防御成比例，而等级和攻击倍乘与智力与灵巧相关。
Texts.Eng: Press [Special 1] to build a flying drone, or do so while crouched to build an automatic turret: each has an independent 60 second cooldown. Turrets and drones last for 60 seconds or until they are defeated. Turret and drone Health and Protection scale with your own Health and Protection, whereas Level and Power Multiplier scale with Intelligence and Dexterity.

Texts.Chs: 扳手：单手扳手。用这把武器击败敌对机器人会使其变得友善。
Texts.Eng: Wrench: a One-Handed Wrench. Defeating robotic enemies with this weapon makes them friendly.
